title: Reform to veteran pension system (The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China) ...
text: ( Source : The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China ) BEIJING - China will ensure and improve veterans' standard of living through a reformed pension system, Xinhua learned on Oct 7. The State Council and the Central
